title: The Medical Institution shall file an undertaking to abide by the cited terms and conditionsbefore allowing utilization of 50% of additional permissible FSI beyond Zonal (basic) FSI
clause_text: The Medical Institution shall file an undertaking to abide by the cited terms and conditionsbefore allowing utilization of 50% of additional permissible FSI beyond Zonal (basic) FSI. Additional BUA beyond Zonal (basic) FSI shall be utilized for bonafide educational purpose only. Such Institutions shall make available some rooms to Govt as and when required.
section: Terms and Conditions for Medical Institutions and Institutional Building

source_pdf.text_snippet: The Medical Institution shall file an undertaking to abide by the cited terms and conditionsbefore allowing utilization of 50% of additional permissible FSI beyond Zonal (basic) FSI.
